thread.title: Here is what the Rams depth chart looks like now before the NFL draft
thread.title_full: Here is what the Rams depth chart looks like now before the NFL draft

title: Here is what the Rams depth chart looks like now before the NFL draft
text:
Here is what the Rams depth chart looks like now before the NFL draft Here is what the Rams depth chart looks like now before the NFL draft By Bryan Kalbrosky 3 hours ago Follow @BryanKalbrosky 429 shares By: Bryan Kalbrosky | 3 hours ago Follow @BryanKalbrosky LOS ANGELES, CA – DECEMBER 24: Todd Gurley #30 and Jared Goff #16 of the Los Angeles Rams look on before the game against the San Francisco 49ers at Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum on December 24, 2016 in Los Angeles, California. (Photo by Harry How/Getty Images) 
The Los Angeles Rams have made a few key moves via free agency that have already changed how their depth chart looks like for next season. 
Considering the Rams have very little cap space left before they restructure any contracts and head into the NFL draft, the roster seems almost ready for next season. 
However, there are some obvious holes that still need to be addressed before OTA’s and the upcoming preseason. We took a look at the depth chart for all of the positional groups for the Rams. 
We also spoke about what Los Angeles needs to do in the draft to fix the problems they would need to field a team ready to compete in 2017. We also used the depth chart from Alden Gonzalez at ESPN .
